short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to easily retrieve your session cookies each time you use ThoughtfulGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Here is what you can achieve by using ThoughtfulGPT Extension:

- Extract LinkedIn profile information

How does this extension work?
This extension will automatically retrieve the session cookies of the LinkedIn account you are connected to. Once you log into your ThoughtfulGPT account, go to "LinkedIn Scraper" from the sidebar. Now, from the extension, click on "Populate Cookie Field" to fill the "Cookie" input field in the ThoughtfulGPT page.

If you have any questions about this extension, feel free to send us an email to our support team at support@thoughtfulgpt.com.
